sentences.english: How do I know she won't kick, or bite at my crotch?
sentences.chinese: 我如何確知她不會亂踢亂踹，或咬我的褲襠？

sentences.english: I said, ‘I kicked in the front door.
I thought for sure I was saved, when he started beating on me and kicking me.
sentences.chinese: 我還以爲他會拉我一把，可是他卻開始打我踹我。

sentences.english: When I saw this tree, I wanted to kick it out of the door and down the street.
sentences.chinese: 我一看到這棵樹，就恨不得把它踹出門滾到大街上。

sentences.english: Don't try to kick out the windshield; you'll never be able to do it.
sentences.chinese: 不要嘗試踹開擋風玻璃，因爲那樣根本行不通。

sentences.english: He will come upon rulers as upon mortar, As the potter treads the clay.
sentences.chinese: 他必臨到掌權的，好像臨到灰泥，彷佛窯匠踹泥一樣。

sentences.english: He launched a brutal kick in batman's face.
sentences.chinese: 他朝着勤務兵的臉野蠻地踹了一腳。

sentences.english: It's just like me granpappy always said: A kick be worth a thousand words.
sentences.chinese: 就像俺爺爺常說的，說千言不如踹一腳。

sentences.english: He treads on rulers as if they were mortar, as if he were a potter treading the clay.
sentences.chinese: 他必臨到掌權的，好像臨到灰泥，彷佛窯匠踹泥一樣。

sentences.english: The farm girl also kicks him at dinnertime.
sentences.chinese: 晚餐時間，農場上的那個女孩子也會踹他。

sentences.english: You will tread upon the lion and the cobra; you will trample the great lion and the serpent.
sentences.chinese: 你要踹在獅子和虺蛇的身上，踐踏少壯獅子和大蛇。

sentences.english: Anyway if I get tired of them I'll fuck them off cruelly.
sentences.chinese: 當我玩膩了時，我會狠狠地踹開他們。

sentences.english: The theme for this release is Kick-Boxing.
sentences.chinese: 本次新套路的主要內容是踢踹搏擊。

definition: to swing (one's arms, a heavy object)/to wave (a sword, one's fists)/to fling (money)
to step on/to tread on/to wear (shoes)/(slang) to dump (sb)/Taiwan pr. [deng4]
to throw down/to fall/to drop and break
to beat up/to break to pieces
to smash/to pound/to fail/to muck up/to bungle
to knock against/to bump into/to run into/to meet by accident
to swear while talking/to be foul-mouthed
